DataElement.preferredName: Systemic Corticosteroid Therapy Administered Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A coded response to questions which are necessary to allow a person to participate in a clinical study that are related receiving treatment with corticosteroids via a delivery method that will affect the entire body as outlined in the protocol.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Systemic Corticosteroid Therapy Administered Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Treatment with corticosteroids via a delivery method that will affect the entire body (oral, intramuscular, intravenous)._The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test)._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Treatment with corticosteroids via a delivery method that will affect the entire body (oral, intramuscular, intravenous).

Concepts.definition: Treatment with corticosteroids via a delivery method that will affect the entire body (oral, intramuscular, intravenous).

Property.preferredDefinition: The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator to represent a response of Yes, No, or Not Applicable._The affirmative response to a question or activity._The non-affirmative response to a question._Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context._A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: Is patient receiving systemic
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient receiving systemic corticosteroid therapy at a daily dose higher than 15 mg prednisone or equivalent?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient receiving systemic corticosteroid therapy at a daily dose higher than 15 mg prednisone or equivalent?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient receiving systemic corticosteroid therapy at a daily dose higher than 15 mg prednisone or equivalent and previous corticosteroid therapy has not been stopped or reduced to the allowed dose at least 7 days prior to the CT/MRI screening?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient receiving systemic corticosteroids (either IV or oral steroids, excluding inhalers or low-dose hormone replacement therapy) within one week prior to administration of first dose of study drug?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient receiving systemic corticosteroid therapy at a daily dose higher than 15 mg prednisone or equivalent or has previous corticosteroid therapy not been discontinued or reduced to the allowed dose, at least 7 days prior to the CT/MRI screening?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 6
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient on supraphysiologic doses of steroids or use of such within the previous six weeks?

ReferenceDocuments.name: GOG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have ongoing prednisone (equivalent) dose requirement > 1 mg/kg/day (or equivalent)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient currently using systemic corticosteroids or immunosuppressive agents, except for low doses of steroids (e.g., less than 10 mg of prednisone or equivalent dose of other steroid) used for treatment of non-hematologic medical condition (e.g., chronic adrenal insufficiency), inhaled corticosteroids, or topical steroids?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 7
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient receiving systemic steroids that have not been stabilized to the equivalent of less than or equal to 10 mg/day prednisone prior to the start of the study drugs and throughout the study?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 8
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have a condition requiring systemic treatment with either corticosteroids (greater than 10 mg daily prednisone equivalents) or other immunosuppressive medications within 14 days of study drug administration?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have a condition requiring systemic treatment with either corticosteroids (greater than 0.25 mg/kg (10 mg) daily prednisone equivalent) within 14 days or other immunosuppressive medications within 30 days of enrollment?

DataElement.administrativeNotes: 2023.11.3 QT added per ticket request CADSR0003032. ak
